markdownRemark.html: Located on the shores of the Atlantic coast in the province of Cádiz, very close to the Doñana National Park. One of the largest in Europe. With a width of 345 m. (more than 120 players can practice at the same time) and 350 m. long, located on the beachfront overlooking the Atlantic Ocean. All practice areas have artificial lighting.

frontmatter.title: Golf Almerimar
frontmatter.description: Golf Almerimar - Located on the shores of the Atlantic coast in the province of Cádiz, very close to the Doñana National Park. One of the largest in Europe. With a width of 345 m. (more than 120 players can practice at the same time) and 350 m. long, located on the beachfront overlooking the Atlantic Ocean. All practice areas have artificial lighting.
frontmatter.address: Avda. Julián Laguna 1,  Urb. Almerimar, 04711 Almería, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 65.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 65.00 euros
